data.actual_result: The channel overlaps another channel and can become completely stuck, to the point you have to exit out of server settings in order to fix it
data.expected_result: The channel reverts back to its original slot
data.short_description: Channel overlaps another channel if you turn your device off while holding the channel (in channel sort)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings  - Click on channel  - Click sort and select text channels - Now select a channel hold on it and move it down some in the list - While still holding onto the channel hit your device power button
